sections.heading: Proceeding by minor parentA minor parent, or a guardian or other legal representative of a minor parent, may maintain a proceeding on behalf of or for the benefit of the minor's child
sections.text: Acts 1995, No. 251, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1996; Acts 2015, No. 80, ยง1, eff. July 1, 2015.
